title: Meditation Timer
description: A comprehensive meditation timer built in React, where users can create a custom soundscape, store and retrieve session data (firestore), view their history, see session data on weekly or monthly charts, earn badges for reaching milestones and more
text1: Responsive single page application for record label Occupy Sound. Featuring a full screen CSS glitch effects, fully custom soundcloud player, dispersion hover effects and more.
text2: Fully responsive design, ensuring the timer is fully usable and optimized for any device. Featuring a sleek minimal design with an interactive background effect which utilizes WebGL to change the background while you scroll down the page...

title: Safe Space Parking
description: Safespace Parking helps you easily find parking spaces that meet your needs, providing peace of mind by showing user reviews and ratings indicating if the space is safe, accessible and within your budget.

title: Occupy Sound
description: Responsive single page application for record label Occupy Sound. Featuring a full screen CSS glitch effects, fully custom soundcloud player, dispersion hover effects and more.

title: Sustainable world
description: This marketing campaign was part of the Graphics module in my final year of Digital Design at Brunel. The aim of the campaign was to raise awareness on sustainability issues that are affecting our planet. These include pollution, climate change, deforestation and other global issues affecting the ecosystem.

title: Portfolio site
description: A modern responsive website for up and coming artist Curtis Valentine, featuring a custom expandable grid

title: DJ Promo website
description: A bespoke responsive website for DJ Scarlett O'Malley, featureing a lightweight video background

title: Cookery App Design
description: Vegetarian cooking app design made with Google material design.

title: Sixteen Step Records
description: Welcome to the underground of London town... Reponsive website featuring custom soundcloud player, shopify and bandcamp powered ecommerce, CSS glitch effects and more! Click link below to see the website in the wild...

title: Neville Bruton
description: Bespoke web build for design and project management practice NB Design. Features an introduction animation, a full screen fading slideshow with overlaid logo, custom image galleries, custom animated menu icon and responsive navigation menu.

title: Tesseract Recordings
description: Responsive website for record label Tesseract Recordings. Featuring custom spotify player, releases catalogue artists pages and more!
